description: This file declares functions, types, and macros for inter-process communication (IPC) transport mechanisms, including connection management, message allocation, publish/subscribe, and message sending/receiving functions in C.

methods.name: transport_malloc_msg
methods.description: Allocates memory for a message, with potential for transport-specific buffers.

methods.name: transport_realloc_msg
methods.description: Reallocates memory for a message buffer.

methods.name: transport_free_msg
methods.description: Frees memory used by a message.

methods.name: transport_connect
methods.description: Establishes an IPC connection to a host and port.

methods.name: transport_establish
methods.description: Sets up an IPC server channel bound to a specified host and port.

methods.name: transport_pub_register
methods.description: Registers as a publisher for event notifications on a channel.

methods.name: transport_sub_register
methods.description: Registers as a subscriber to events on a channel.

methods.name: transport_get_shutdown_sock_readfd
methods.description: Gets the shutdown socket file descriptor for cleanup or signaling.

methods.name: transport_close
methods.description: Closes and shuts down an IPC channel.

methods.name: transport_sub_recv
methods.description: Receives a JSON event for a subscription.

methods.name: transport_publish
methods.description: Publishes a JSON event to subscribers.

methods.name: transport_send
methods.description: Sends an IPC message with optional timeout.

methods.name: transport_recv
methods.description: Receives an IPC message with optional timeout.

methods.name: transport_sendmsg
methods.description: Sends an IPC message with a control block and timeout.

methods.name: transport_recvmsg
methods.description: Receives an IPC message with a control block and timeout.

methods.name: transport_abortmsg
methods.description: Aborts a message transaction and shuts down the associated control.

methods.name: transport_shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down all pending IPC sender messages.
